extendedInfo.description: ATTENTION : â Absolute Brain Teaser âAdvance to the next Room by solving the puzzle!Official page : http://www.facebook.com/100RoomsSequel : '100 Escapers'Features:â 40 Roomsâ Addicting mini puzzles!â Combine the items!â Complete utilization of your devices features!â Different themed rooms!â itâs FREE!Contact us if you have problems or comments with the app.ââ How to play âââ Unlock the door to get the next level.â To do that, observe the room and find the items which will help you to get out of here. You can combine two items to get NEW item.â You can pick certain items up and use them from your inventory.â To Zoom item click it TWICEâ To Combine items zoom first item then select second and click on zoomed image of first item.Enjoy.

reviews.title: Uh what?
reviews.comment: Started off great. Was liking it just like all the other \"100\" type games. But then it just got stupid and not making any since. People love a challenge of having to hunt items down and escape a room, but then all these with having to find combinations and stuff of zodiac signs and coordinates and animals and bananas....really? I mean what? Who cares!? 100 doors, 100 floors, and 100 missions...AWESOME GAMES...this one just flat SUCKS unless you are some ridiculously smart genius or something! Jeez!
reviews.author: Kyall Jones

reviews.title: Ed
reviews.comment: I give this game 5 stars because it will keep you thinking. Can\'t wait for the next update looking forward to the new levels.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: 100 rooms
reviews.comment: Best game ive downloaded. Kept me entertained for hours and love the hints room. Would have been 5* but there ls not 100 rooms yet!!
reviews.author: Garry Brewin

reviews.title: Good, but...
reviews.comment: The graphic is terrible, make it HD if you want a big rating, in rest the levels are very good and the idea to give hints for gold what is possible to win at a machine where you need to do the relation between the words and images is very good. Do the cost of hints more less, now are so big...(at high levels, sure). And make more faster new levels.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: good I guess
reviews.comment: Game is really fun the graphics & challenges are better than most. But some of the rooms are impossible without cheats. & not all the floors are uploaded. Don\'t put out game unless its complete. I don\'t send out my customers with half the service done.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awhh..
reviews.comment: Not too good.. ads reload or change causing screen to go black with only ads continuing to show.. was looking forward to playing this :/
reviews.author: Ashley H

reviews.title: Stuck like chuck
reviews.comment: I can\'t figure out how to get out of room 5...there\'s this blue paper on a picture I see the letter n but what do you do with? Can I get help pleasssse
reviews.author: Lashawn Day

reviews.comment: fantastic games ,, but some levels their answers can\'t be known by logic or by think & it doesn\'t give u a real hint for the answer, i have had to search for their answers on the internet
reviews.author: Diana Hamid

reviews.title: love it!!!
reviews.comment: I absolutely LOVE this game! I love a good challenge and some of these are a great challenge.
reviews.author: quintel hal

reviews.title: Does not work
reviews.comment: Will not allow me to join parts. Can find the knob and lock in #1 But can\'t do anything with them. Have played these types of games in the past but this is one big annoyance. Sorry
reviews.author: l nix

reviews.title: Does not work
reviews.comment: I have a samsung galaxy s3 and it doesnt work on my phonevall that shows up is the ad on the bottom for the google play store
reviews.author: Ethan Kopp

reviews.title: Level 20 grrrrr!!
reviews.comment: The last 5 levels were stupid nd now level 20 is causing force close. Before i can get all the pieces into appropriate spots, the level closes nd i have to start over. Once or twice is fine but 20 times (!!!) is ridiculous.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lol wut?
reviews.comment: Got to level 7 and it won\'t let me use the wire in the mailbox? Anyone else having this trouble?
reviews.author: Katie Neave

reviews.title: Reason for new game
reviews.comment: The developer informed me that the new game is a continuance to 100 rooms, because 100 rooms app wasnt able to put all rooms on one due to the data size.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Updates
reviews.comment: Last update stuffed this game up. Some levels won\'t open. Also not saving my progress. Hope this latest update fixes it as its a pretty good game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Addictive!
reviews.comment: I can\'t put it down. Makes you think way out of the box, definitely worthy of playing!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I\'m loving it!!
reviews.comment: I\'m in love with this game... Some levels r pretty easy but I love it either way... The new upgrade is Awesome, taking more than two days to get past some of the levels!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Levels don\'t make sense
reviews.comment: Started nice. After a while, levels didn\'t make any sense anymore. Sometimes the graphics are confusing or distracting or low quality.
reviews.author: Denilson S\303\241

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: Good game some don\'t make. Sense in storytelling of picking up clues so. Have to look. Up DONT BOTHER. BUY CLUES OR CHEATS and DONT think u get 100 it stops at 40!!!!! So why not call it 40 rooms!!!!!
reviews.author: Karen Farrell

reviews.title: Please fix
reviews.comment: Loved the game until last update that brought back to level 40 and can\'t get any further anymore please fix and will go back to 5 stars
reviews.author: A Google User
